item.Q:

2: pond; reservoir

item.A:
拒 (strokes unavailable)
jù

葛 (strokes unavailable)
Gě
诸葛亮 (諸葛亮) ZhūgěLiàng Zhuge Liang (181-234 AD), military leader and Prime Minister of Shu Han 蜀漢|蜀汉 during the Three Kingdoms period; the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius
